dynamic-element.dynamic-content: See quality through every lens! Clarity, a leading global manufacturer of innovative eyewear, seeks a detail-oriented Associate of Product Quality to join our growing team. In this vital role, you'll play a key role in ensuring the quality and consistency of our eyewear products, from raw materials to finished goods. You'll conduct inspections, analyze data, and collaborate with colleagues to maintain Clarity's reputation for exceptional craftsmanship.

dynamic-element.name: RichText84253560
dynamic-element.dynamic-content:
• Conduct visual inspections of eyewear components and finished products according to established quality control standards.
  • Utilize measuring tools and gauges to verify product dimensions and specifications.
  • Perform basic quality control tests to identify and document any defects or inconsistencies.
  • Analyze inspection data and identify trends to pinpoint potential quality issues.
  • Participate in root cause analysis to determine the source of quality problems and recommend corrective actions.
  • Assist with maintaining and calibrating quality control equipment.
  • Maintain accurate and up-to-date quality control documentation.
  • Collaborate with production teams to ensure adherence to quality standards and implement corrective actions.
  • Stay up-to-date on quality control procedures and industry best practices.

dynamic-element.name: RichText12712785
dynamic-element.dynamic-content:
• High school diploma or equivalent (preferred).
  • A strong attention to detail and a commitment to quality assurance.
  • Basic understanding of quality control principles and methodologies (a plus).
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team to achieve quality goals.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively document findings and collaborate with colleagues.
  • Proficient in basic math and data analysis.
  • Ability to follow instructions and adhere to established quality control procedures.
  • A strong work ethic and a commitment to continuous improvement.
